response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $15,000 by us, reflecting its high-quality materials, innovative design, and unparalleled functionality. We believe it could be a valuable asset to you, offering numerous benefits that align with your goals and aspirations. Considering its unique features and the time and resources invested in its creation, we kindly invite you to consider acquiring this product at our suggested price. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of enhancing your experience with our product.", "product_price": 15000}
